name: XV
summary:
A YNFG for Dream Diary Jam

XV demo is a Yume Nikki Fangame for Dream Diary Jam 2017. 

Notice that this is an early demo and the game is still in development. Current build might contain bugs of all kinds. Please report them to http://xv-ynfg.tumblr.com/ or to us here!

The demo contains 4 effects, 6 areas and secrets hidden everywhere. 

Note: the final puzzle contains some small bugs and is being fixed at the moment! It's still solvable, but some of the hints might be odd. 

Last updated: 
12/3/2017
